description:
In our House, creativity is a way of life. Warehouse Art Collective forges friendships and art under one roof. Artists who call this craftwork factory home have a lot in common, while exploring ideas and artistic visions with various materials and mediums.
The public can witness the artistic process and engage with contemporary art in the work/live industrial unit within Haringey Warehouse District.

factsheet.heading: Art of Warehouse Living
paragraphs: Living the warehouse lifestyle is never dull and the space adds to a sense of freedom, which is a demanding factor for creative minds to develop and materialise their ideas. Therefore, Warehouse Art Collectiveâ€™s artists often create opportunities for local community and broader audience to connect, share skills and collaborate.

travel_info: Train: Harringay Green Lanes, Seven Sisters, Stamford Hill

name: Warehouse Art Collective
